attributes.action: NO to a Compulsory D.N.A. Database.
attributes.additional_details: To many actions are being taken in the name of Terrorism which is leading England down a precarious road of Communism and Dictatorship. Therefore we the undersigned say no to any National Database as deemed ILLEGAL by the European Court on Human Rights.The British Govenment cannot pick and choose which laws to abide by because it suits them. .
